block.p: IBARGUEN-Peter ''Donny''. On September 1, 2000. Past-president L.I. Skydivers Association, Secretary of EUZKO ETXEA BasqueAmerican Club, Chairman Pan Am Blood Bank, TWU Senior Shop Steward JFK Local 504. Survived by beloved cousins, Helen, Marie and Joanne Abascal, NYC and many cousins in the Basque provinces Vizcaya, Spain. For further information, call Casey Funeral Home, 718-447-4242.
